Text.Page:
Our scouts reported {@LinkCreature:418#2008#vendron capacitors} in the Argon Catacombs. These devices feed energy to argon units on the surface.

{@LinkCreature:418#2002#Tibonel} knows where the capacitors are.

Your mission is to destroy them.

The {@LinkCreature:418#2008#vendron capacitors}?

They're just north of here, but they're not just pieces of metal you can slag with one strike. The argons will try to protect them.

Hah! With the capacitors out of action, the argons might find our next engagement goes in our favor, not theirs!

Long live the Shariar!
